channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Wargaming By Air, Land, and Sea
item.description: Dominate by land, air, and sea
item.content:encoded:
Achieve combined arms dominance with this battle-ready bundle from Wargaming.net, packed with vehicles and more lethal assets for the Steam versions of the free-to-play World of Tanks, World of Warplanes, and World of Warships. Batter opposing armor with the Elusive Menace Pack, which gives you access to the American T78 tank destroyer. Secure naval supremacy with the Texas Pack, which unlocks the titular American Tier V battleship. Bully the skies in your new heavy fighter with the Messerschmitt Me 210 Pack. Get all these, including bonuses like crew and hangar slots for each, as well as 6 other awesome Wargaming.net packs, and help support charity with your purchase!

Content in this bundle is compatible with the Steam versions of the games only. All base games are available separately.

item.title: Action Roguelikes: What Kills You Makes You Stronger
item.content:encoded: Failure is the only path to success in this bundle of action-packed roguelikes! Form a co-op party and delve into the dangerous dungeons of Barony. Ascend a tower with an awesome arsenal in the thrilling God of Weapons. Climb aboard your robospider and dig into the secrets of Wall World. Get these games and more, and help support International Medical Corps & World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: WePlay Expo - Discover China Indies
item.description: Showcasing the games and devs of China
item.content:encoded: Discover a world of independent games crafted by developers across China in this bundle celebrating WePlay Expo, China’s largest gaming culture festival—taking place November 18 & 19 in Shanghai! Enter an era of discovery in GY Games’ Sailing Era, and conquer the sprawling deserts of Han-Squirrel Studio’s Sands of Salzaar. Revitalize your alma mater or your father’s workshop in Pathea’s Let’s School and My Time at Portia. Be a part of the WePlay Expo from wherever you are, and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Adventures in the 2nd Dimension: Positively Playful Platformers
item.content:encoded: Leap, hop, and head up and to the right through the colorful worlds of these playful 2D platformers! Jump into a challenging journey through time and space as Super Bunny Man. Master movement and momentum to climb a mountain in Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends. Speed through the wilderness as a silk-slinging spider in Webbed. Get Hoa, One Hand Clapping, and more—and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
